lyrics:
7 contributorsparking lot party lyricsintro
hey its big d and bubba and and were live on location we want you to come on out because this is not just a party its a parking lot party with lee brice

verse 1
johnnys firing up his coleman grill
weve got 24 tall boys on the chill
yeah 14 of ems mine
a little marshall tucker on the radio
cant you see
you know were just catchin a little groove before the show
yeah aint playing nothing slow

chorus
at the parking lot party
tailgate buzz just sipping on suds
aint never too early
to light one up fill up your cup
cause there aint no party like the preparty
and after the party is the afterparty
at the parking lot party

verse 2
well the opening band is doin soundcheck
man they sound pretty good
hell i aint even bought no tickets yet
yeah but thats alright we dont care
cause all the pretty girls are sitting right here
kicking back in the lawn chairs
see lee brice liveget tickets as low as 88you might also likechorus
at the parking lot party
tailgate buzz just sipping on suds
aint never too early
to light one up fill up your cup
cause there aint no party like the preparty
and after the party is the afterparty
at the parking lot party

wohohohoh

its one hell of a time and its all for free

at the parking lot party
tailgate buzz just sipping on suds
aint never too early
